Question: This person met model and actress Jenny McCarthy in 2005 and made their relationship public in June 2006.
Hints: In 2004, this person starred in Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind.
This person eventually landed a recurring role in the show which first aired on April 15, 1990.
To which I would counter: If you can't let this person be this person, put someone boring and less expensive in the role.
